ternalType":"bytes","name":"_proof","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_blockNum","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_timestamp","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"_previousHeader","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_rootIndex","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"_rlpTransitTx","type":"bytes"}],"name":"withdrawAsset","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"result","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"holdIndex","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"changeCurrentAdminConfirmationThreshold(uint32)":{"details":"| This function takes in an index for a proposal ot change the current administrator confirmation threshold.      | Uses Multi-signature permissions.","params":{"_proposalIndex":"The index for a specific proposal to change the current administrator confirmation threshold."},"returns":{"result":"   | 0 = not an administrator    | 1 = invalid proposal index    | 2 = not enough administrators to achieve confirmation threshold    | 3 = proposal has expired    | 4 = not enough administrators have permissioned change    | 5 = admin confirmation threshold set"}},"getAdminAccess(address)":{"details":"Gets the level of access for a specific administrator.","returns":{"result":"the level of access for this administrator"}},"getAdminConfirmationProposal(uint32)":{"details":"Gets the components of a specific NofM change proposal.","params":{"_proposalIndex":"A proposal index"},"returns":{"adminThreshold":"the threshold of the NofM voting within this proposal","endTime":"the end time of this proposal, after which it cannot be voted on","isCompleted":"whether this proposal has been completed by multisig parties"}},"getAdminConfirmationThreshold()":{"details":"Gets the NofM threshold currently required for passing multisig votes.","returns":{"results":"the current NofM threshold"}},"getNumAdminConfirmationProposals()":{"details":"Gets the number of a specific NofM change proposal.","returns":{"result":"the number of a specific NofM proposals"}},"isAdministrator(address)":{"details":"Returns whether a given address is an administrator.","params":{"_administratorAddress":"The public address of a specific administrator."},"returns":{"result":"   | true = is administrator    | false = either administrator unset or demoted"}},"promoteAdministrator(address)":{"details":"| Promotes a new administrator. If there is only a primary Administrator set, this will allow the addition of the second administrator and enable multisignature requirements for any actions of this contract (or those inheriting it).      | Uses Multi-signature permissions if there is more than one Administrator onboarded.","params":{"_newAdministratorAddress":"The new Administrator's public address."},"returns":{"result":"   | 0 = not administrator    | 1 = administrator already promoted    | 2 = new administrator promoted    | 3 = added vote to promote administrator"}},"proposeChangeCurrentAdminConfirmationThreshold(uint256)":{"details":"This function proposes a change to the threshold of voting required (N signatories of M total set size = NofM). To prevent stale inattention results, timeout after 2 days.","params":{"_newThreshold":"The new threshold (N of M multisig) that is needed to be passed."},"returns":{"result":"   | 0 = not an administrator    | 1 = not enough administrators to achieve confirmation threshold    | 2 = new proposal added"}},"revokeAdministrator(address)":{"details":"| Revokes an existing administrator from the multisignature set, checks to see if the # of required votes would be higher then the administrator set size, and if so adjusts to match.      | Uses Multi-signature permissions if there is more than one Administrator onboarded.","params":{"_revokeAdministratorAddress":"An existing Administrator's public address."},"returns":{"result":"result"}},"setPrimaryAdministrator(address)":{"details":"Sets the primary Administrator for this contract (or those that inherit from it). This transfers ownership of this contracts first administration duties (to find and onboard a second party for multisignature requirements) to the set Administrator's public address.","params":{"_newAdministratorAddress":"The new Administrator's public address."},"returns":{"result":"   | 0 = not owner    | 1 = already set first administrator    | 2 = setup first administrator"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"changeCurrentAdminConfirmationThreshold(uint32)":{"notice":"Multiple proposals can be constructed for different sets to apply to change the administrator threshold. As the permissions for multisig keys use a voting set nonce underneath the hood, a change in the current administrator set will cancel all current votes."},"promoteAdministrator(address)":{"notice":"| Uses composition features (based on current validator set) so data structure may be orphaned when promotion/demotion events occur.         | Whenever this function is called (with a passing vote), there will be a re-hashing of the voting set nonce, so all current votes will become invalidated."},"revokeAdministrator(address)":{"notice":"| Uses composition features (based on current validator set) so data structure may be orphaned when promotion/demotion events occur.         | Whenever this function is called (with a passing vote), there will be a re-hashing of the voting set nonce, so all current votes will become invalidated."}},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/ShyftBridge.sol":"ShyftBridge"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Administrable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x65a1dd7abdfdb014b571712f38834028ebedd75cc9cbd142cd105e2f49cf4455","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://5a49fb5d60839776789c50bb1d01cc6f85429e050310ecf0fdc1bc292511742b","dweb:/ipfs/QmNcHVEVgo3r7MCK2a3RPaL1QuZErVZ2jXnUCKZordV3jr"]},"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Constants/TokenConstants.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4ebbddadb95e537ba343a78a070c432116f8d0aaba4d4cf5547ffd202a53f6fa","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://f821a2b3305721ed50dee6918f44bf7c0c5705ee01363a4d6a7ec3c2d4cc8d53","dweb:/ipfs/QmbMQtm2ibt1q2MPZtHdJhdDygC71Xon2MfPwjEDat6RUK"]},"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Interfaces/IShyftSafe.sol":{"keccak256":"0x457a9e83079d9338652df4e547d7bf1f08e6cad09ec26c01368359e33ae07c15","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://f557895c8f4b294e713faf9f8ebb74e6a606b79739128dadc02083899e4b3106","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFJYt89p8JQiecfsnUDe9NCJDfQpARJ2W5zwb3pJWTd8"]},"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Libraries/BytesLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9ac2dde137c5abcc033c74dc3686faa021ba69486a4d07ea773ee7787eea9d79","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://5da5938b77f71785acfe9d7a6b770a65416063f43c6f0149a5675032e385aaa8","dweb:/ipfs/QmdXP9t3McGiZDnercgoWzzHpfoYpy88M9fs9zxWcTLqye"]},"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Libraries/MerklePatriciaProof.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc12d4b33cbf5e6ac86194e919fa1d697e25c80971e9ea34590453f2459dbc171","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://c604c634351e7151a8b483e4bed9146a7bc83c68b00da891c5a754fe2e77834a","dweb:/ipfs/QmWb9qQrEr3aawV1qSj6b7SxLK9kGiibvVi6DJuurGmuSU"]},"/opt/shyft-ta-node/contracts/Libraries/RLP.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa3723606278675e392e0657af0cda4719c13cbd2788d83ad66e4292f83ff0db9","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://3670a3c0afac349 changeCurrentAdminConfirmationThreshold(.details: | This function takes in an index for a proposal ot change the current administrator confirmation threshold.      | Uses Multi-signature permissions.

params._proposalIndex: The index for a specific proposal to change the current administrator confirmation threshold.

returns.result: | 0 = not an administrator    | 1 = invalid proposal index    | 2 = not enough administrators to achieve confirmation threshold    | 3 = proposal has expired    | 4 = not enough administrators have permissioned change    | 5 = admin confirmation threshold set

getAdminAccess(address).details: Gets the level of access for a specific administrator.

returns.result: the level of access for this administrator

getAdminConfirmationProposal(uint32).details: Gets the components of a specific NofM change proposal.

returns.adminThreshold: the threshold of the NofM voting within this proposal
returns.endTime: the end time of this proposal, after which it cannot be voted on
returns.isCompleted: whether this proposal has been completed by multisig parties

getAdminConfirmationThreshold().details: Gets the NofM threshold currently required for passing multisig votes.

getNumAdminConfirmationProposals().details: Gets the number of a specific NofM change proposal.

returns.result: the number of a specific NofM proposals

isAdministrator(address).details: Returns whether a given address is an administrator.

params._administratorAddress: The public address of a specific administrator.

returns.result: | true = is administrator    | false = either administrator unset or demoted

promoteAdministrator(address).details: | Promotes a new administrator. If there is only a primary Administrator set, this will allow the addition of the second administrator and enable multisignature requirements for any actions of this contract (or those inheriting it).      | Uses Multi-signature permissions if there is more than one Administrator onboarded.

returns.result: | 0 = not administrator    | 1 = administrator already promoted    | 2 = new administrator promoted    | 3 = added vote to promote administrator

proposeChangeCurrentAdminConfirmationThr.details: This function proposes a change to the threshold of voting required (N signatories of M total set size = NofM). To prevent stale inattention results, timeout after 2 days.

params._newThreshold: The new threshold (N of M multisig) that is needed to be passed.

returns.result: | 0 = not an administrator    | 1 = not enough administrators to achieve confirmation threshold    | 2 = new proposal added

revokeAdministrator(address).details: | Revokes an existing administrator from the multisignature set, checks to see if the # of required votes would be higher then the administrator set size, and if so adjusts to match.      | Uses Multi-signature permissions if there is more than one Administrator onboarded.

setPrimaryAdministrator(address).details: Sets the primary Administrator for this contract (or those that inherit from it). This transfers ownership of this contracts first administration duties (to find and onboard a second party for multisignature requirements) to the set Administrator's public address.

returns.result: | 0 = not owner    | 1 = already set first administrator    | 2 = setup first administrator

changeCurrentAdminConfirmationThreshold(.notice: Multiple proposals can be constructed for different sets to apply to change the administrator threshold. As the permissions for multisig keys use a voting set nonce underneath the hood, a change in the current administrator set will cancel all current votes.

promoteAdministrator(address).notice: | Uses composition features (based on current validator set) so data structure may be orphaned when promotion/demotion events occur.         | Whenever this function is called (with a passing vote), there will be a re-hashing of the voting set nonce, so all current votes will become invalidated.

revokeAdministrator(address).notice: | Uses composition features (based on current validator set) so data structure may be orphaned when promotion/demotion events occur.         | Whenever this function is called (with a passing vote), there will be a re-hashing of the voting set nonce, so all current votes will become invalidated.
